statements.select:
SELECT T.BIN_NO ,T.CREATION_DATE ,CASE T2.BIN_STATUS WHEN CHAR(36) THEN '正常' ELSE '异常' END BIN_STATUS ,CASE T2.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN '_' THEN '在库' WHEN 'O' THEN '预约出库' WHEN 'I' THEN '预约入库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '其他' END BIN_BIZ_STATUS ,T.PALLET_NO ,T1.MATER_NO ,T1.MATER_NAME ,T1.PRODUCT_GUID ,T1.PRODUCT_DATE ,T1.PRODUCT_QTY ,T1.MAIN_UNIT FROM WBS_BIN T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN PSB_BIN_STATUS T2 ON T2.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO
T.BIN_NO like '%'+#where.BIN_NO#+'%'
T1.MATER_NO like '%'+#where.MATER_NO#+'%'
T.PALLET_NO like '%'+#where.PALLET_NO#+'%'
T.CREATION_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
T.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY T.BIN_NO

SELECT T.BIN_NO ,T.CREATION_DATE ,CASE T2.BIN_STATUS WHEN CHAR(36) THEN '正常' ELSE '异常' END BIN_STATUS ,CASE T2.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'O' THEN '预约出库' WHEN 'I' THEN '预约入库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '其他' END BIN_BIZ_STATUS ,T.PALLET_NO ,T1.MATER_NO ,T1.MATER_NAME ,T1.PRODUCT_GUID ,T1.PRODUCT_DATE ,T1.PRODUCT_QTY ,T1.MAIN_UNIT FROM WBS_BIN T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN PSB_BIN_STATUS T2 ON T2.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO
T.BIN_NO = #where.BIN_NO#
